attributes.action: change the London 2012 Olympics Logo.  The new logo is to be chosen by a vote from the general population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo unveiled on Monday, has received a lot of criticism, and the Olympics committee should listen to those who are paying the £9+ billion - the tax payers!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
